taggedText: <document>Jose Maria, As discussed, please confirm. 1. QUZ Nxlan sells USD 500 thousand, within the terms of an American Forward @ EURUSD 1.2342, expiry date 27 December 2018. Upfront: ?70. Delta Hedge: SAN TOTTA sells EUR 408600, buys USD @ EURUSD 1.1976, value date 10 January 2018 2. QUZ Nxlan sells GBP 500 thousand, within the terms of an American Forward @ EURGBP 0.8988, expiry date 27 December 2018 Upfront: ?60. Delta Hedge: SAN TOTTA sells EUR 561000, buys GBP @ EURGBP 0.8839, value date 10 January 2018.
